entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
